snippet: Nine months ago, FiveThirtyEight made mention of a 150,000-jobs-per-month figure in the jobs report as a possible over-under benchmark number. What this may all mean, now that we're merely days before the election.
abstract: Nine months ago, FiveThirtyEight made mention of a 150,000-jobs-per-month figure in the jobs report as a possible over-under benchmark number. What this may all mean, now that we're merely days before the election.
